welcome to this space

I finally decided to create a space to put some of the things I write and create. This is my attempt number only god knows, will it be the final one? I have previously written here and also here. And before that on some other platforms, too, but nothing too important.

what are you going to find here

I honestly have absolutely no idea. Alright, maybe a little bit.

  • projects: sometimes I do semi-artistic things (blushing profoundly)
  • about: the stuff I come up about myself; the bits I think are worth sharing
